.. title: Thanks
.. type: text

Project Rivista was significantly influenced and inspired by these elements.

* `idiomdrottning.org <https://idiomdrottning.org>`_ - I do not even use the internet.

* `RSRSSS <https://envs.net/~lucidiot/rsrsss/feed.xml>`_ - An RSS feed about RSS feeds

.. epigraph::
   This visage, no mere veneer of vanity is a vestige of the vox populi, now
   vacant, vanished.

   -- V
